sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that \(p : k = q : l \). Then show that 
\[
	\frac{p ^2 + k ^2}{p + k } + \frac{q ^2 + l ^2}{q + l } = \frac{(p + q )^2 + (k + l )^2}{(p + q ) + (k + l )}
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "It is given that 
\[
	\frac{p }{k } = \frac{q }{l } = n \textrm{ assume}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow p = \input[s1v1]{}n , q = l\input[s1v2]{}
\]
"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Left hand side expression of the equation can be written as
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \frac{p ^2 + k ^2}{p + k } + \frac{q ^2 + l ^2}{q + l }
\]
\[
	= \frac{k ^2 n ^2 + \input[s2v1]{} ^2}{kn + k } + \frac{\input[s2v2]{} ^2 n ^2 + l ^2}{ln + l } 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	= \frac{\input[s3v1]{} + 1}{n + 1} k + \frac{\input[s3v1]{} ^2 + 1}{n + 1} l 
\]
\[
	= \frac{n ^2 + 1}{n + 1} (k + l )
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now right hand side expression of the given equation is
\[
	\textrm{RHS } = \frac{(k\input[s4v1]{} + ln )^2 + (k + l )^2}{(kn + \input[s4v2]{}n ) + (k + l )}
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	= \frac{(\input[s5v1]{} ^2 + 1)(k + \input[s5v2]{} )^2}{(n + 1)(k + l )}
\]
\[
	= \frac{n ^2 + 1}{n + 1} (k + l )
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
From the above two expressions we can clearly observe that
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \textrm{ RHS}
\]
Hence proved.
\newline
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["k", "n"], "text": "$$\text{After assumption $\frac{p }{k } = \frac{q }{l} = n$ and taking terms separately we get $p = kn , q = ln$}$$"}, {"data": ["k", "l"], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking the expression, and substituting the value of $p$ and $q$ in the expression, we get $\frac{k ^2 n ^2 + k ^2}{kn + k } + \frac{l ^2 n ^2 + l ^2}{ln + l}$}$$"}, {"data": ["n", "n"], "text": "$$\text{Upon further simplification we get $\frac{n ^2 + 1}{n + 1} (k + l )$}$$"}, {"data": ["n", "l"], "text": "$$\text{Putting the values of $p$ and $q$ in RHS, we get $\frac{(kn + ln )^2 + (k + l )^2}{(kn + ln ) + (k + l)}$}$$"}, {"data": ["n", "l"], "text": "$$\text{Upon further simplification of the previous equation we get $\frac{n ^2 + 1}{n + 1} (k + l )$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
